Shr 39 cts vs 39 cts Net 24.4 mln vs 23.8 mln Revs 425.9 mln vs 396.2 mln Nine mths Shr 1.23 dlrs vs 1.04 dlrs Net 76.3 mln vs 64.1 mln Revs 1.26 billion vs 1.12 billion NOTE: Net adjusted to account for the recent 2-for-1 split of the company's common.
Qtr 1986 includes a seven cts per shr gain due to net after-tax foreign currency exchange effect. Reuter
